name: Reliqua
description:
The tech giant Reliqua released their autonomous car line yesterday, and there has already been a fatal accident involving the new vehicle. You are a detective at the local police department who has been assigned to the case. Collect evidence surrounding the crash, interview witnesses, and discover how this accident was able to occur.

This game was designed as part of an MS project by McKenna Gameros. It addresses the relationship between ethics and design in the engineering field, as well as the importance of communication in the workplace.

Advisor: Yunus Telliel

Reader: Ben Schneider
